overview: Sweetheart Video proudly presents the stunningly beautiful Dani Daniels in her own movie. Dani, a powerhouse girl/girl performer has featured prominently in many a Sweetheart title, and now showcases her sensuality and voracious appetite in four scenes; each with a girl she has specifically chosen. Sovereign Syre, Misty Stone, Cherie DeVille and Natasha Nice enjoy Dani's sapphic skills as she drives them to mind blowing orgasms, and they happily return the favor.
title: Dani Loves Girls
